items.sentence: I suspect that Tom and Mary are ready to do that.
I suspect that Tom and Mary are right about that.
You know I used to have one of those, don\'t you?
I think that it\'s unlikely Tom will get elected.
Tom certainly isn\'t as healthy as he used to be.
Let\'s get some brochures from the travel bureau.
Are you going to be in Australia on October 20th?
Do you remember the first time you were arrested?
Why don\'t you folks make yourselves comfortable?
I hear that Tom is planning to retire in October.
Tom didn\'t know he no longer needed to be there.
I wouldn\'t allow Tom to do what he wanted to do.
I wouldn\'t have said anything to Tom about that.
I\'m looking for someone to do my laundry for me.
If you need money, then why don\'t you get a job?
You\'re too young to be doing this kind of thing.
You\'re very fortunate to have such good friends.

Tom didn\'t know where Mary bought her groceries.
